name: Markitect Ltd
tag_list: wireless, mobile, content, digital, applications, middle-east, arab, islamic, multi-cultural, ethnic, vas, entertainment, infotainment, edutainment, mobile-web, iphone, android, blackberry, j2me, symbian, development, management, creation, online-media, l
overview:
Markitect deals with creative and productive e-Ideas, with each providing differing levels of technology, business orientation, strategic vision, as well as deep multi-cultural/lingual understanding, across the Middle East and the Arab world.

Relying on innovative approaches rather than conventional ones, Markitect is specialized in Mobilizing Content and Services, and can undertake all aspects of designing and launching cutting-edge Mobile Content Solutions and Value Added Services, specifically tailored towards each client’s and target audience’s unique needs.

Our Offering: Wide range of Cutting-Edge Mobile Content Solutions, Value added Services and Revenue Generating Products.

Areas Of Expertise: * Digital Content Creation and Management * Revenue-Generating Mobile Media, Content and Services * Application Development & Localization (Web / Mobile) * Multi-Cultural / Multi-Lingual Middle Eastern Expertise * On-Demand Content Production and Localization * Content Aggregation, Marketing and Distribution

Our InfoTainment Offering-Domains: * Audio & Music * Video * Mobile TV * Applications, Widgets & Games * Mobile Internet Sites & Applications * Graphic Products
